title: The area consisting mainly the slopes around the Core Zone having ecological importance due to its w
clause_text: The area consisting mainly the slopes around the Core Zone having ecological importance due to its water shed and more specifically shown in Green colour on the plan appended herewith as Appendix - ―M‖
